The locals call Fayetteville, NC Fayettenam.  It has always seemed like a trashy city.  Lots of soldiers get into trouble there.  As for the soldier, I am not really surprised about it.  Everyone is taught the rules upon entering the military.  You have to be careful who you associate with and what you do or you can get into some real trouble.
